scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Tracy Tibbels
scrape.text: It seemed like this story took a while to get to the meat of what was happening--yet, I was immediately hooked! I love it when I want to drop everything else I've got going on, just so I can sit and listen to my book! This story was funny, dark, scary, aggravating, and also described, on occasion, food and drink. ALL of my favorite things to read about!!!
